title: The JUAN-DERSTORM
body_text:
WOLF-JUAN II
Winner Advances to DODGEBALL 150!
The rematch of the century and it could have only happened just this once. Two men, two warriors of steel, each willing to lay it all on the line
One More Time
.
Flash Results by Game
Wolf: (0)
Juan: 1, 2, 3, 4
Like their previous encounter, Juan Londono and Justin Wolf looked to gain the best of four grueling rounds. Fortunately for "The Cockroach", Wolf's hand-picked enemies shattered any hopes of "The Punter" extracting revenge and in the process, has allowed his number one adversary to cruise into the first main event spot of DODGEBALL 150.
Juan Londono
defeated
Justin Wolf
, taking all 4 games of the match.
Birthday Celebration!
Very special birthday wishes went to Diana DiBuccio, Lauren Stopa, and Melissa Kerr on this June 15 evening. The
Letsche Rims
featured blow-up pictures of Stopa and DiBuccio while posters of the three female titans lined the inside fence. Snack foods, drinks, and a cake were also available for those hungry superstars.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Juan Londono defeated Justin Wolf, 4 - 0, in a DODGEBALL CXL rematch to advance as one of six captains at DODGEBALL 150.
PickYourPoison
team selection rules were in effect.
Captain Statistics
: Londono 6-2-1 / Wolf 1-2-1. Londono's participation and victory in this "Family Affair" return bout allowed him to reach several new personal records; (1) has won four of his last five encounters, (2) second person to compete in more than one
PickYourPoison
match-up, (3) fourth captain to reach 6 victories.
Moments & Stars
: Alysha Kelly scoring the first elimination of the night on Cap. Londono; Eamon Fitzpatrick smacking the rim in Game 1; newbie Kelsey Clayton's dominating debut; the torrential downpour to conclude the night
Attendance
: 24, comprised of 18 men and 6 women
New Players
: Kelsey Clayton
Other Notes
: DODGEBALL 142 was the 29th
Wet War
. This was the first
PYP
contest in seven and half months. DODGEBALL 142 also featured the first shut-out since the DODGEBALL 97 slaughter,
WALL v. ALL 2
, in July 2007.
PickYourPoison
History
:
DODGEBALL 75
..
DODGEBALL 78
..
DODGEBALL 92
..
DODGEBALL 114
body_html:
WOLF-JUAN II
Winner Advances to DODGEBALL 150!

The rematch of the century and it could have only happened just this once. Two men, two warriors of steel, each willing to lay it all on the line One More Time.

Flash Results by Game
Wolf: (0)
Juan: 1, 2, 3, 4

Like their previous encounter, Juan Londono and Justin Wolf looked to gain the best of four grueling rounds. Fortunately for "The Cockroach", Wolf's hand-picked enemies shattered any hopes of "The Punter" extracting revenge and in the process, has allowed his number one adversary to cruise into the first main event spot of DODGEBALL 150.

Juan Londono defeated Justin Wolf, taking all 4 games of the match.

Birthday Celebration!
Very special birthday wishes went to Diana DiBuccio, Lauren Stopa, and Melissa Kerr on this June 15 evening. The Letsche Rims featured blow-up pictures of Stopa and DiBuccio while posters of the three female titans lined the inside fence. Snack foods, drinks, and a cake were also available for those hungry superstars.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Juan Londono defeated Justin Wolf, 4 - 0, in a DODGEBALL CXL rematch to advance as one of six captains at DODGEBALL 150. PickYourPoison team selection rules were in effect.
Captain Statistics: Londono 6-2-1 / Wolf 1-2-1. Londono's participation and victory in this "Family Affair" return bout allowed him to reach several new personal records; (1) has won four of his last five encounters, (2) second person to compete in more than one PickYourPoison match-up, (3) fourth captain to reach 6 victories.
Moments & Stars: Alysha Kelly scoring the first elimination of the night on Cap. Londono; Eamon Fitzpatrick smacking the rim in Game 1; newbie Kelsey Clayton's dominating debut; the torrential downpour to conclude the night
Attendance: 24, comprised of 18 men and 6 women
New Players: Kelsey Clayton
Other Notes: DODGEBALL 142 was the 29th Wet War. This was the first PYP contest in seven and half months. DODGEBALL 142 also featured the first shut-out since the DODGEBALL 97 slaughter, WALL v. ALL 2, in July 2007.

PickYourPoison History:
DODGEBALL 75 .. DODGEBALL 78 .. DODGEBALL 92 .. DODGEBALL 114
